casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Anthony BALL 102P13-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Charles Anthony Ball, for Ball, Charles Anthony.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of August 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
